Cedric Beust wrote:
>  > From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
>  > Behalf Of J. B. Rainsberger
> 
>  > I have never used TestNG; however, based on what I have seen,
>  > read and what Cedric has told me, I would use TestNG mostly
>  > to add tests to Legacy Code (any code I'm afraid to change)
> 
> I think TestNG's scope is broader than that.

Don't get me wrong, Cedric. I'm only saying how I would use it, but that 
is because I am already a JUnit disciple. :)
